pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Fast Way to Calculate the p-Value of One or Multiple Log-Rank- Tests // It is for all people who have to compute many Log- Rank-Tests and the 'survival' package is not fast enough for their purpose. Therefore this small package provides two functions, one for a single Log-Rank-Test and another which calculates many Log-Rank-Tests at a time using threading. Both runs very fast because it uses C++ code with 'Rcpp'.
